ing: 2 (6 ounce) boxes HorizonÂ® ClassicMacâ„¢ Pasta Shells & White Cheddar Cheese
1 cup grape or cherry tomatoes, halved
des: "Busy day? Take it easy with this Easy Caprese Mac and Cheese. Jazz up your mac and cheese with tomatoes, mozzarella and basil in this Caprese-inspired macaroni and cheese."
ins:
Prepare the Horizon mac and cheese according to the package directions.
Stir in the tomatoes, mozzarella pearls, and basil. Serve immediately.
